fields.content:
Enjoy the flexibility of our Day Workspace  without the need for long term commitment. Our Day office Workspaces are rented on an hourly, daily, or weekly basis, making them a flexible and cost-effective alternative to traditional office rentals. 

We offer a convenient and professional workspace that can be tailored to specific needs, without the long-term commitment and expense of a traditional office lease. Be it for a short period of time, such as for meetings, interviews, or as a temporary workspace for remote workers. 

Designed and located in our premium commercial buildings and offer a high degree of privacy, quality furnishings, advanced technology and security. 

We offer access to various amenities such as high-speed internet, printing and scanning services.

Our Exclusive private office workspaces are designed to provide individuals with a secluded and dedicated work environment, providing a high level of isolation and privacy.  

This can help to minimize distractions, enhance productivity, and promote a sense of professionalism. 

Designed and located in our premium commercial buildings and offer a high degree of privacy, high-quality furnishings, advanced technology and security. 

We offer access to various amenities such as high-speed internet, printing and scanning services.

Our Coworking space offers you the flexibility of affordable workspace and an opportunity to network and collaborate with other professionals from a variety of industries. 


Designed and located in our premium commercial buildings in the heart of London.


Located in a community-oriented environment, we provide a professional and social atmosphere that promotes collaboration and networking among members.


We offer a range of amenities and services such as desks, chairs, high-speed internet, printing and scanning services, and kitchen areas. 
Perfect for businesses who require office space for up to 30 people.

Enjoy the flexibility and cost-effective solution of our  Conference Room to facilitating communication, collaboration, and productivity for your business

We provide a professional and private environment for conferences, enabling participants to focus on the task at hand without distractions.

Designed and located in our premium commercial buildings in the heart of London.

Our Conference Room can accommodate dozens of attendees. Equipped with  chairs, audio-visual equipment such as projectors and screens, and teleconferencing systems to facilitate remote participation.

Perfect for businesses who require  space for up to 35 people.

Our Meeting Rooms are designed to inspire, accommodate and facilitate your best work.. Comfortable space that allows teams to collaborate, brainstorm, and make decisions in a professional setting.

Whether  youâ€™re  holding a client  meetings, presentations, and discussions. Here at DESK HO we got you covered.

Featuring a large table in the center, surrounded by comfortable chairs.  Designed and located in our premium commercial buildings in the heart of London. Our Meeting Room can accommodate a dozen attendees.
